Core:PCProperties.Core:Property:
(\{ (\{ 6, 3 \}), (\{ "h3", "Members List" \}), (\{ "members_list", "" \}), (\{ "paragraph", "\\---Three Corners Skinks---\
\\r\\nOur Rules:\
\
\\\\r\\n\\r\\n1) \\Never betray The Skinks.\\ We will kill anyone who betrays our trust, Skink or not. Don't talk about Skink business with outsiders EVER, our business is for The Skinks only.\
\
\\r\\n\\r\\n2) \\The Skinks come first.\\ The whole group is more important than any one individual. This includes outside friends and family members.\
\
\\r\\n\\r\\n3) \\Work hard.\\ The only way we make money is if everyone's working the streets hard. Train hard, never take a day off.\
\
\\r\\n\\r\\n4) \\Never fight alone.\\ We have strength in numbers, we must always use group tactics when we fight. There's no such thing as honor in battle.\
\
\\r\\n\\r\\n5) \\Screw the Spoons.\\ Never cooperate with the Law, they're just a big gang who gets paid to harass people like us. Never reveal secrets to the Law, even if it means being arrested. \
\
\\r\\n\\r\\n6) \\Screw the Houses.\\ Those damned Nobles stay rich and mighty by keeping us poor and dirty. Never bow to them, they are not our betters.\
\
\
\
\\r\\n\\r\\n\\r\\n\\---Three Corners Skinks---\
\\r\\nOur Oath:\
\
\\\r\\n\\r\\n\Like skinks, we started with nothing. \
\\r\\nThrough hard work, we earned all we have. \
\
\\r\\n\\r\\nWe owe nobody, but each other. \
\\r\\nWe trust nobody, but each other. \
\\r\\nWe need nobody, but each other. \
\
\\r\\n\\r\\nI promise to be loyal to The Skinks, \
\\r\\nto protect The Skinks, \
\\r\\nand to improve The Skinks as long as I live.\
\
\\r\\n\\r\\nNo matter how rich or powerful we become, \
\\r\\nwe will never forget that we started like Skinks.\
\
\ \" \}), (\{ "h3", "Guild Inventory" \}), (\{ "inventory", "" \}), (\{ "page", "Main Page", "default" \}) \})
(\{ (\{ 6, 3 \}), (\{ "paragraph", "This is the guilds public page. The page has not yet been updated by a guild member." \}), (\{ "page", "Main Page", "default" \}) \})
